channel.title: Slight problem with pest control
channel.description: For some reason i'm not obtaining damage when i attack the portals , and i have noticed the portals attack me back there not suppose to do that i know, i'm still looking around for how to make portals give me damage when i attack them in pest control but i'm not able to find anything on it.

item.title: Slight problem with pest control
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:551770”]They handle damage in two places:
CombatAssistant and NPCHandler.
It will be in one of those.

Search for the portal IDs in order to find what you are looking for.

NPC retaliation is also in NPCHandler.[/quote]

I found nothing in CombatAssistant, but i found these 2 codes in NpcHandler } else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].needRespawn == true && npcs[i].npcType != 6142 && npcs[i].npcType != 6143 && npcs[i].npcType != 6144 && npcs[i].npcType != 6145) { Client player = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[npcs[i].spawnedBy]; if (player != null) { npcs[i] = null;
Along with this not sure what these codes mean. case 6143: return 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Slight problem with pest control
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

They handle damage in two places:
CombatAssistant and NPCHandler.
It will be in one of those.

Search for the portal IDs in order to find what you are looking for.

NPC retaliation is also in NPCHandler.

Read full topic
